data.description: Converting XML hash into plain text code
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I wrote this module while converting my web-forum into xml-based
    code. I wished to have fast and simple mechanism to convert nested
    hash structure into normal plain text XML code.

    First I thought of XML::Tree, XML::Node or XML::Output but as far
    as my module generates tru xml code, I choose the straightforward
    name XML::Code.
